sentences.sContent: Nature and fertility would have been all-important; they would have worshipped sun gods, water gods, moon gods and doubtless bison gods.
sentences.sContent_eng: Nature and fertility would have been all-important; they would have worshipped sun gods, water gods, moon gods and doubtless bison gods.
sentences.sCn: 最重要的一点肯定是自然资源的丰饶多产，他们崇拜太阳神、水神、月亮神，无疑还有野牛神。

remMethod.val: “拜神” → 印度人视牛为神物， 美洲野牛去印度肯定也被当成神来拜 → 美洲野牛

trans.tranOther: an animal like a large cow, with hair on its head and shoulders
